package step4;
import java.text.ParseException;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;


public class Task {
	
	public String getDate(String releaseDate,int day){
		/********* Begin *********/
		  try {
			Date parse = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").parse(releaseDate);
			long time = parse.getTime() / 1000 + day * 86400;
			return new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").format(new Date(Long.parseLong(time + "000")));
		} catch (ParseException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		return "";


        /********* End *********/
	
    }
	
}
